name: Midnight Visit
description:
A small bitsy game about helping out a stranger.

Controls: Arrow keys to move.

This game was made over the week of 11/29/2020, as the eleventh in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.

Credits

Game made by me in Bitsy

Bitsy engine by Adam Le Doux (https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy)
